metadata.description: Can you best the Thunderlock Barcrawl? It's not every day you find a tavern with a dungeon challenge built in its basement! It's up to your players to attempt this part proving ground, part extreme sporting event and get their names on the illustrious Wall of Crawlers. This zero issue of the all-new "Rolled & Told" includes a ready-to-play, fun adventure for Dungeons & Dragons 5th Ed. The free issue is packed with beautiful illustrations, comics coinciding with the adventure to excite and inspire your players, and helpful articles sure to enhance the game for new and old game masters alike.
metadata.name: Rolled & Told
